evidence.claim: The University of North Texas Health Science Center utilizes AWS for cloud computing resources.
UNT Health Science Center is compliant with HIPAA standards for health information security.
The institution uses FHIR standards for health data exchange within its applications.
HL7 messaging standards are employed in their health information systems for interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: No evident focus on X12 transactions or clearinghouse roles.
